New Records: Juan Soto is on the verge of joining an incredible group in baseball history by hitting his next home run, which will be his 200th career HR, 8th-most before turning 26
Key Match Events: The New York Yankees beat the Kansas City Royals 4-3 in extra-innings on Wednesday night at Yankee Stadium
Post-Match Reflections: The win moves the Yankees to 84-62 this season while the loss drops Kansas City to 80-67, and New York now leads the American League East by 1.5 games over the Baltimore Orioles
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals are now 1.5 games up on the Minnesota Twins for the second wild card spot in the AL and are seeking their first playoff berth since 2015
Others: Juan Soto went 1-for-5 with a home run, two RBI and a run scored, and pairing with Aaron Judge in the Yankees order, he's got 39 bombs this season to go along with 100 RBI
